title: FPS drop at start of game and stays like this
body: OK so yesterday I tried to play 2 games but both of them in a row I had fps of 6 and lower, and when I retried just now my fps was the same than yesterday but my graphic card is perfectly OK and my connexion is super fast and I don't know why my fps is so low can someone help me please?

replies.body: I had to close lol recorder(lol replay) as a user suggested and it works fine now for me.

Hey Jowwes,

I'm sorry that you're getting such crappy FPS. Have you checked out the [Wrenchmen's Toolbox](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues) concerning FPS drops? It has a lot of valuable info that can help increase your FPS.

After going through that, Deleting your Game.cfg file may help alleviate some of these bad drops. You can find it at:

 Your Install location (Usually your C: drive) > Riot Games > League of Legends > Config

After deleting the file, start a custom game so that the file recreates itself with the proper settings!
